name: Drizzle Delight
description:
In Drizzle Delight you will help water drops to complete their natural cycle.

There are 3 stages:

- Precipitation Phase -> Touch the water drops to pop them, don't let them reach the bottom of the screen! Get at least 30 points to pass!

- Infiltration Phase -> Sort the water drops to win. Pink drops to the left, blue drops to the right! Get at least 20 points to pass!

- Evaporation Phase -> Oh no! The sun is shooting sunbeams! Avoid them and shoot water drops at the sun until it explodes! Be careful, if you fail, you will go back to the start of the game!

Are you capable of getting a High Score of at least 10 points?
